BR_text.BRsummary: token.conjuncts does not return conjuncts of conjuncts
BR_text.BRdescription:
If you have the sentence:
 "The boy and the girl and the man went to the store."
 boy.conjuncts will only return girl, and girl.conjuncts will not return anything. Seems to be caused by
 <denchmark-link:https://github.com/explosion/spaCy/blob/e7f8e13cf3740487e557beec52c26233847da9a9/spacy/tokens/token.pyx#L480>this line</denchmark-link>
  Personally i would expect:
 boy.conjuncts -> [girl]
 girl.conjuncts -> [man]
 I think the only requirements are that the elements are connected by a coordinating conjunction, with no restriction on either element being a conjunction themselves.
 
 Operating System: Ubuntu
 Python Version Used: 2.7
 spaCy Version Used: 1.6.0

comments_0.comment_text:
I think I was intending for
 <denchmark-code>boy.conjuncts -> [boy, girl, man]
 girl.conjuncts -> [boy, girl, man]
 </denchmark-code>
 
 I think it's nice to get all of the conjuncts.

comments_1.comment_text: makes sense, so calling conjuncts on any element of a continuous sequence of dependent conjuncts returns the whole sequence, in order of dependence, including itself. If you agree I can do a PR sometime this week.
